entry.title: The Greatest Hits
entry.summary:
Author: Jazz_hates_jazzmusic

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,691Chapters: 1/7Kudos: 2

Summary: After Jason’s death, you discover a new power. By listening to songs that played when you were with Jason, you would be transported back into that moment till the song ended.Now you’re hellbent on changing his ending as a new person enters your life. Red Hood.(The Greatest Hits Movie AU.)
